title: Ghosts of the Civil War - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/14/19
itunes:title: Ghosts of the Civil War - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/14/19
description:
George Noory and paranormal researcher Rich Newman explore his research into ghosts and hauntings at various Civil War battlefields, and whether this proves there is life after death.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
